title: Ka nunna hian ruma Krista nghakin
lyrics:
Ka nunna hian ruma Krista nghakin,
Lal ram lo lang tur chhu,
Zan thim tawpa khawvar hun tur,
Hmangaihna Lalhmel duhawm chu.

Kraws hmangaihna thu hril zel hi,
Tul lo sela, ka Lal Isu,
Lei hrehawm hi kalsan thuaia,
I hnen thlen ka nghakhlel.

Riangvai chan kraws put hi ka Lal Isu,
Dam ni awm thei si lo;
Nunna changa lawm mai lo hian,
Kan tuar phal hian i ngawi reng fo.

Aw, ka Lal krws, ka phatsan lo vang che,
Sawi tam tlangrel karah;
Thlarau bo thim hnuaia lengte
Chhanin kraws kawng ka zawh zel ang
